members.name: Entity ID
members.description: Identifies the Event in event scripts.

members.name: Attached Part Name
members.description: The part that the treasure is attached to.

members.name: Item Lot ID
members.description: The item lot to be given.

members.name: Action Button ID
members.description: If not -1, uses an entry from ActionButtonParam for the pickup prompt.

members.name: Pickup Anim ID
members.description: Animation to play when taking this treasure.

members.name: Is in Chest
members.description: Changes the text of the pickup prompt.

members.name: Starts Disabled
members.description: Whether the treasure should be hidden by default.

members.name: Maximum Generated Count
members.description: The maximum number of enemies that this generator can generate in total.

members.name: Generator Type
members.description: The spawn location behavior to use upon a generation interval.

members.name: Maximum Spawn Count
members.description: The maximum number of enemies that this generator can generate upon a generation interval.

members.name: Random Spawn Count: Minimum
members.description: The minimum number to use when determining the amount of enemies to generate within a generation interval.

members.name: Random Spawn Count: Maximum
members.description: The maximum number to use when determining the amount of enemies to generate within a generation interval.

members.name: Generation Interval: Minimum
members.description: The minimum time interval (in seconds) between each generation interval.

members.name: Generation Interval: Maximum
members.description: The maximum time interval (in seconds) between each generation interval.

members.name: Initial Spawn Count
members.description: The initial number of enemies to spawn upon initialization of the generator.

members.name: Spawn Region Names
members.description: Regions where parts will spawn from.

members.name: Spawn Part Names
members.description: Parts that will be respawned.

members.name: ObjAct Part Name
members.description: The part to be interacted with.

members.name: ObjAct ID
members.description: A row in ObjActParam.

members.name: Host Entity ID
members.description: The NPC whose world you're entering.

members.name: Event Flag ID
members.description: Set when inside the event's region, unset when outside it.

members.name: Activation Goods ID
members.description: ID of a goods item that is used to trigger the event.

members.name: Platoon Script ID
members.description: The platoon script to apply when activated.

members.name: Group Part Names
members.description: The parts that belong to this platoon.

members.name: Patrol Type
members.description: Determines patrol behavior. 0 = return to first region on loop, 1 = go through list backwards on loop, etc.

members.name: Walk Region Names
members.description: The regions that belong to this patrol.

members.name: Rider Part Name
members.description: The rider Part that may ride the mount Part.

members.name: Mount Part Name
members.description: The mount Part.

members.name: Sign Part Name
members.description: The Part that the signpool is associated with.

members.name: Sign Puddle Param ID
members.description: The ID of the SignPuddleParam row to use for this signpool.

members.name: Retry Part Name
members.description: The Part that is associated with this retry point.

members.name: Event Flag ID
members.description: Flag that must be set for retry point to be available.

members.name: Retry Region Name
members.description: The Region that this retry point covers.

members.name: Name
members.description: The name of this entry.

members.name: Model Name
members.description: The model used by this part; requires an entry in ModelParam.

members.name: Instance ID
members.description: Involved with serialization.

members.name: Layout Path
members.description: A path to a .sib file, presumably some kind of editor placeholder.

members.name: Position
members.description: The position of this part.

members.name: Rotation
members.description: The rotation of this part.

members.name: Scale
members.description: The scale of this part. Scale will NOT affect the scale of enemies or the scale of in-built collision for objects and assets (except for assets in Elden Ring).

members.name: Game Edition Disable Type
members.description: Toggles the loading of this part.

members.name: Entity ID
members.description: Identifies the part in event scripts.

members.name: Uses Parts Draw Param ID
members.description: Enables use of PartsDrawParamID. If false, asset param is used instead.

members.name: Parts Draw Param ID
members.description: The Parts Draw Param ID to use.

members.name: Is Point Light Shadow Source
members.description: Is this part to be considered a Point Light shadow source.

members.name: Is Shadow Source
members.description: Is this part to be considered a shadow source.

members.name: Is Static Shadow Source
members.description: Is this part to be considered a static shadow source.

members.name: Is Cascade Shadow Source
members.description: Is this part to be considered a cascade shadow source.

members.name: Is Shadow Destination
members.description: Is this part to be considered a shadow destination.

members.name: Is Shadow Only
members.description: Is this part only rendered when calculating the shadow pass.

members.name: Is Drawn by Reflection Camera
members.description: Is this part drawn by the reflection camera.

members.name: Is Drawn Only by the Reflection Camera
members.description: Is this part only drawn within the reflection camera.

members.name: Entity Group ID
members.description: A entity group ID associated with this part. Allows multiple parts to be identified with a single entity ID.

members.name: Display Group
members.description: A display group for this part.

members.name: Draw Group
members.description: A draw group for this part.

members.name: Collision Mask
members.description: A collision mask for this part.

members.name: Display Group
members.description: A display group for this part.

members.name: Light Set ID
members.description: ID of the value set from LightSet ParamEditor to use.

members.name: Fog Param ID
members.description: ID of the value set from FogParamEditor to use.

members.name: Light Scattering ID
members.description: ID of the value set from LightScattering : ParamEditor to use.

members.name: Environment Map ID
members.description: ID of the value set from Env Map:Editor to use.

members.name: Transition Time
members.description: Transition time between scenes.

members.name: Graphics Param Override: [1]
members.description: Value of the hundredths place of a Gparam to override use.

members.name: Graphics Param Override: [2]
members.description: Value of the hundredths place of a Gparam to override [1] with.

members.name: Graphics Param Override: [3]
members.description: Value of the hundredths place of a Gparam to override [1] and [2] with.

members.name: Graphics Param Override: [4]
members.description: Value of the hundredths place of a Gparam to override [1], [2] and [3] with.

members.name: Map ID
members.description: The four ID parts of the map that this map object belongs to. Used in overworld map tiles to link the map object to a specific overworld tile. Order is reverse of map ID string.

members.name: Think Param ID
members.description: An ID in NPCThinkParam that determines the enemy's AI characteristics.

members.name: NPC Param ID
members.description: An ID in NPCParam that determines a variety of enemy properties.

members.name: Talk ID
members.description: An ID pointing to an .ESD file that contains the a Talk setup.

members.name: Platoon ID
members.description: An ID pointing to a platoon type, used by patrolling groups of enemies.

members.name: Character Init ID
members.description: An ID in CharaInitParam that determines a human's inventory and stats.

members.name: Collision Part Name
members.description: The Name of the collision that this Enemy starts on.

members.name: Walk Route Name
members.description: Walk route followed by this enemy.

members.name: Activation Condition ID
members.description: ID in ChrActivateConditionParam that affects enemy appearance conditions.

members.name: Backup Event Anim ID
members.description: Default event animation to apply to the enemy whilst it is idle.

members.name: SpEffect Set ID
members.description: Refers to SpEffectSetParam ID. Applies SpEffects to an enemy.

members.name: Hit Filter ID
members.description: Sets collision behavior. Fall collision, death collision, enemy-only collision, etc.

members.name: Play Region ID
members.description: Used to determine invasion eligibility.

members.name: Disable Torrent
members.description: Disable being able to summon/ride Torrent.

members.name: Fast Travel Enabled Flag
members.description: Disables Fast Travel if Event Flag is not set.

members.name: Collision Name
members.description: The collision part to attach to.

members.name: Map ID
members.description: The map to load when on this collision.

members.name: Asset SFX Param Relative ID
members.description: Value added onto model ID determining AssetModelSfxParam to use.

members.name: Disable Torrent
members.description: Disable being able to summon/ride Torrent, but only when asset isn't referencing collision DisableTorrent.

members.name: Disable upon Map Load - Map ID
members.description: Disables the asset when the specified map is loaded.
